title: [BUG] --continue header pinning breaks scrollback
description: In TUI resume/continue flow, header appears pinned to top and bottom fills with blank lines while scrolling. Desired behavior: bottom UI stays locked; top/header should not be force-pinned except when actively composing input.

logs.msg: Starting investigation in run/render_state resume path. Goal: stop header pinning and bottom newline accumulation during scrollback in --continue.

Root cause: startup resume path sets ChatPosition::Tracking when history fits viewport (position_after_reprint), which top-anchors UI/header and leaves large blank region. Patched run.rs to force Scrolling mode after resume reprint.

Adjusted startup resume reprint: when history is shorter than available chat rows, apply ScrollDown padding so content is bottom-aligned above UI (no top pinning for short history). Keep position Scrolling for bottom-locked UI.
